column2: "Afei Reubenmba nye Gadmba no wɔ ofiembowa dodow a wɔdɔɔ so kɛsenara: na aber a wohun Jazer
column3: nye Gilead asaase no
column5: bea no fata ofiembowa bea no;"

column3: nye ɔsɔfo Eleazar
column4: nye mboanofo no mu mbapɔmba no dɛ
column16: "asaase a EWURADZE bɔɔ no wɔ Israel mboanofo no enyim no
column17: yɛ asaase a oye ma mbowanyɛn
column18: na wo nkowaa so wɔ ofiembowa."

column3: Sɛ yeenya w’enyim enyimnyam a
column4: ma wɔmfa asaase yi mma wo nkowaa ma yɛmfa; mma mmfa hɛn nntwa Jordan."

column2: "Na Moses see Gadmba nye Reubenmba no dɛ
column3: Aso hom nuanom nkɔ ɔsa

column2: "Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom tu Israelmba akoma dɛ mma wonntwa nnkɔ asaase a EWURADZE dze ama hɔn no do yi?"

column3: wɔ aber a mosomaa hɔn fii Kades-barnea dɛ wɔnkɔhwɛ asaase no."

column2: "Na aber a wɔfowee kɔr Eskol mbɔnsa mu
column3: na wohun asaase no
column4: wobotuu Israelmba no hɔn akoma dɛ mma wɔnnkɔ asaase a EWURADZE dze ama hɔn no do."

column3: na ɔkaa ntam dɛ
column5: "Ampaara mbanyin a wofi Egypt bae no a woedzi mfe eduonu nye ekyir no mu biara runnhu asaase a mekaa ho ntam mekyerɛɛ Abraham
column7: nye Jakob no; osiandɛ woennwie m’ekyir dzi:"

column3: nye Nun ne babanyin Josua: osiandɛ hɔn na woedzi EWURADZE ekyir nokwar mu."
na ɔmaa wokekyiin sar no do mfe eduanan
column4: ma okodur dɛ ebusuasantsen no a wɔyɛɛ bɔn wɔ EWURADZE enyim no nyinara hyewee."

column3: hwɛ
column4: hom asoɛr egyina hom egyanom ananmu
column6: dɛ hom da ho araa dze EWURADZE n’ebufuhyew no reba Israel do."

column2: "Na sɛ hom dan fi n’ekyir a
column3: ɔbɛda ho ara adan hɔn egya wɔ sar no do; na hom asɛɛ ɔman yi nyinara."
Nguamban na yɛbɛgyegye ama hɛn ofiembowa wɔ ha
column4: na nkurow so yɛbɛkyekyer ama hɛn mbofraba:"

column2: "na hɛnankasa dze hɛn ho bɛyɛ har yeemia edzi Israelmba enyim
column3: ekodu dɛ yɛdze hɔn bɔkɔ ekodu hɔn tsenabew ana: na hɛn mbofraba no ntsenatsena nkurow a wɔagye ho ban mu osian asaase no do atsefo no ntsi."
gyedɛ Israelmba ɔbanyin biara enya egyapadze edzi ana."

column2: "Na yɛnnye hɔn remmfa enyadze wɔ Jordan egya
column3: ɔdze kɔ no; osiandɛ hɛn egyapadze ebefir hɛn Jordan nkyɛn ha boka afamu."
Sɛ hom bɛyɛ iyi; sɛ hom bemia homho wɔ EWURADZE enyim akɔ ɔsa
column5: "na hom mu nyimpa biara a oemia botwa Jordan edzi EWURADZE enyim
column6: ekodu dɛ ɔbɛpam n’atamfo efi n’enyim"

column2: "na wɔabrɛ asaase no adze wɔ EWURADZE enyim a: nna n’ekyir no hom bɛsan na hom edzi bem wɔ EWURADZE nye Israelmba ho; na asaase yi nyɛ hom enyadze wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column3: hwɛ hom ayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE: na hom nhu dɛ hom bɔn beyi hom ama."
na nguamban mma hom nguan; na hom nyɛ dza efi hom anomu epue no."

column2: "Na Gadmba nye Reubenmba no kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column3: Wo nkowaa bɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ mo wura ahyɛ no."
nye hɛn ofiembowa nyinara
column4: bɛtsena Gilead nkurow no mu hɔ:"

column3: ɔbanyin biara a oemia rokɔ ɔsa no
column4: botwa mu wɔ EWURADZE enyim akɔko dɛ mbrɛ mo wura aka no."

column2: "Nna Moses dze hɔn ho mbra maa ɔsɔfo Eleazar
column3: nye Nun ne babanyin Josua
column4: nye Israelmba ebusuakuw ebusuakuw mu egyanom efi do etsitsir no."

column3: Sɛ Gadmba nye Reubenmba nye hom twa Jordan
column4: ɔbanyin biara a oemia dzi EWURADZE enyim rokɔko no
column5: na wɔbrɛ asaase no adze wɔ hom enyim a; ɔno hom mfa Gilead asaase mma hɔn ma wɔmfa:"

column2: "na sɛ woemmia nye hom enntwa a
column3: ɔnodze wɔmma wonnya enyadze wɔ hom mu wɔ Keenan asaase do."

column2: "Na Gadmba nye Reubenmba no buaa dɛ
column3: Dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE aka akyerɛ wo nkowaa no

column2: "Yebemia wɔ EWURADZE enyim etwa mu akɔ Keenan asaase do
column3: na hɛn egyapadze a yeenya no wɔ Jordan egya ha no ako hɛn hɔ."

column2: "Na Moses dze Amorifo hen Sihon n’ahendzi
column3: nye Basanhen Ɔge n’ahendzi
column5: dɛ mbrɛ no do nkurow nye no ntoaado tsetsee no
column6: mekyerɛ asaase no do nkurow a ehyia do no
column10: nye Josef ne babanyin Manaasɛ n’ebusuakuw ɔfa no a."

column3: nye Atarot
nye Jazer
nye Bɛt-haran: nkurow a wɔagyegye ho ban
nye Eleale
nye Baal-meon
column5: nye Sibma: na wɔdze edzin fofor totoo nkurow a wɔkyekyeree no."

column2: "Na Manaasɛ ne babanyin Makir mba no sii mu Gilead
column3: na wɔkɛfae
column4: na wotuu Amorifo a wɔwɔ mu hɔ no."

column2: "Na Moses dze Gilead maa Manaasɛ ne babanyin Makir; na ɔtsenaa mu."
"Na Manaasɛ ne babanyin Jair sii mu kɛfaa no nkurow no na ɔfrɛɛ no Havot-jair."

column3: nye no nkuroba
column5: dɛ mbrɛ nankasa ne dzin no tse."
